column4: i am having trouble connecting to freenode using all my irc clients, from kvirc or irssi to pidgin, seems like they are unable to resolve even the name, plus i am getting absolutely no output at all if i try to ping the irc servers. any ideas ? using the webchat now
try connecting via the ip of the server? if that works. that would point to a dns issue.
i normally use googles dns, and opendns (one of each) :)
could be a temp issue with your isp's servers
